div.h2: HSPC Respiratory Rate Units of Measure Value Set
div.p: The list of codes that describe the units of measure used for respiratory rate.
Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from UCUM. Implementer use of UCUM is not covered by this agreement
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://unitsofmeasure.org
CodeDisplay
HzHertz
{Breaths}/minBreaths / minute

name.value: HSPC Respiratory Rate Units of Measure Value Set

description.value: The list of codes that describe the units of measure used for respiratory rate.
